sense.gloss: ups and downs, twists and turns, complications, difficulties, vicissitudes

sdata.j: ↑幾多↑↓いくた↓の↑紆余曲折↑↓うよ|きょくせつ|↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑条約↑↓じょうやく↓は↑締結↑↓ていけつ↓されるに↑至↑↓いた↓った。
sdata.e: The treaty has been concluded after many twists and turns.

sdata.j: あの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓も、↑紆余曲折↑↓うよ|きょくせつ|↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑解決↑↓かいけつ↓した。
sdata.e: There were a lot of twists and turns to the story, but we finally solved the problem.
